author: Alanna Okun
title: I’m still comforted by Fire Emblem: Three Houses, 240 hours in
description: Fire Emblem: Three House’s long replay time and multiple stories is an excellent way to spend your time when stuck at home during quarantine, and a wonderful way for the me to return to gaming.
content:
Its embarrassing how much Ive played Fire Emblem: Three Houses. I got the game for Christmas, started it on the second day of the new decade, and by early April have logged, according to the in-game counter, over 240 hours of play time. 
Wow, my chiropractor… [+10275 chars]
